channel.title: Cost Management on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cost Management on FinanClub

item.title: GRAB
item.description: score:10 Chances: Grab Holdings plans to announce its unaudited second quarter 2023 results, indicating transparency and commitment to investors. Despite job cuts, Grab’s CEO emphasizes the strategic reorganization’s aim to adapt to the business environment and offer more affordable services. Grab’s unaudited financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2023, provide insights into its performance during that period.

item.title: HLN
item.description: score:44 Chances: Haleon has raised its annual organic revenue growth forecast, indicating a positive outlook for demand in essential healthcare products. The company’s focus on essential, over-the-counter respiratory and oral health products has led to growing volumes and consumer spending. Haleon’s partnership with Halodoc in Indonesia to provide mobile clinic services showcases its commitment to improving medical care access.
